document.full_text: u.s. oil rose on tuesday in volatile trade as a weaker dollar and stronger equities lifted prices and offset concerns over sovereign debt and uncertain demand prospects.
document.title: u.s. oil rises on weak dollar and brent pares loss
lines_and_colors: u.s. oil rose on tuesday in volatile trade as a weaker dollar and stronger equities lifted prices and offset concerns over sovereign debt and uncertain demand prospects.
